Name: Fighting Frenzy: Swole Simulator
About the game: Play as a Swolestafarian who is trying to get fit in this 2D game. You start off at the training dojo with a voracious appetite and small muscles. As you play different minigames you will improve your stats depending on how well you perform. Once you feel confident with your stats or you are out of energy, challenge the AI to a fight. The minigames are skill based or reaction time dependent. There are a few hidden secrets you will learn from playing these minigames that helps your character get extra swole. Each minigame will improve a different stat. In 2 player mode, choose the character of your choice and battle it out on one of a dozen stages. This game will improve over time based on your feedback. Leave some!
Developers: Luca Della Valentina-Torzillo,Paul Ton,David J Kim,Nikhil Singh
